00045 int lprocfs_evict_client_open(struct inode *inode, struct file *f)
00046 {
00047         struct obd_device *obd = PDE_DATA(f->f_path.dentry->d_inode);
00048 
00049         atomic_inc(&obd->obd_evict_inprogress);
00050         return 0;
00051 }
00052 
00053 int lprocfs_evict_client_release(struct inode *inode, struct file *f)
00054 {
00055         struct obd_device *obd = PDE_DATA(f->f_path.dentry->d_inode);
00056 
00057         atomic_dec(&obd->obd_evict_inprogress);
00058         wake_up(&obd->obd_evict_inprogress_waitq);
00059 
00060         return 0;
00061 }
00062 
00063 #define BUFLEN (UUID_MAX + 5)
00064 
00065 ssize_t
00066 lprocfs_evict_client_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00067                                size_t count, loff_t *off)
00068 {
00069         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00070         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00071         char *tmpbuf, *kbuf;
00072 
00073         OBD_ALLOC(kbuf, BUFLEN);
00074         if (kbuf == NULL)
00075                 return -ENOMEM;
00076 
00077         /*
00078          * OBD_ALLOC() will zero kbuf, but we only copy BUFLEN - 1
00079          * bytes into kbuf, to ensure that the string is NUL-terminated.
00080          * UUID_MAX should include a trailing NUL already.
00081          */
00082         if (copy_from_user(kbuf, buffer,
00083                            min_t(unsigned long, BUFLEN - 1, count))) {
00084                 count = -EFAULT;
00085                 goto out;
00086         }
00087         tmpbuf = cfs_firststr(kbuf, min_t(unsigned long, BUFLEN - 1, count));
00088         class_incref(obd, __func__, current);
00089 
00090         if (strncmp(tmpbuf, "nid:", 4) == 0)
00091                 obd_export_evict_by_nid(obd, tmpbuf + 4);
00092         else if (strncmp(tmpbuf, "uuid:", 5) == 0)
00093                 obd_export_evict_by_uuid(obd, tmpbuf + 5);
00094         else
00095                 obd_export_evict_by_uuid(obd, tmpbuf);
00096 
00097         class_decref(obd, __func__, current);
00098 
00099 out:
00100         OBD_FREE(kbuf, BUFLEN);
00101         return count;
00102 }
00103 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lprocfs_evict_client_seq_write);
00104 
00105 #undef BUFLEN

00107 int lprocfs_num_exports_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00108 {
00109         struct obd_device *obd = data;
00110 
00111         LASSERT(obd != NULL);
00112         seq_printf(m, "%u\n", obd->obd_num_exports);
00113         return 0;
00114 }
00115 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lprocfs_num_exports_seq_show);

00117 static void lprocfs_free_client_stats(struct nid_stat *client_stat)
00118 {
00119         CDEBUG(D_CONFIG, "stat %p - data %p/%p\n", client_stat,
00120                client_stat->nid_proc, client_stat->nid_stats);
00121 
00122         LASSERTF(atomic_read(&client_stat->nid_exp_ref_count) == 0,
00123                  "nid %s:count %d\n", libcfs_nid2str(client_stat->nid),
00124                  atomic_read(&client_stat->nid_exp_ref_count));
00125 
00126         if (client_stat->nid_proc)
00127                 lprocfs_remove(&client_stat->nid_proc);
00128 
00129         if (client_stat->nid_stats)
00130                 lprocfs_free_stats(&client_stat->nid_stats);
00131 
00132         if (client_stat->nid_ldlm_stats)
00133                 lprocfs_free_stats(&client_stat->nid_ldlm_stats);
00134 
00135         OBD_FREE_PTR(client_stat);
00136         return;
00137 }
00138 
00139 void lprocfs_free_per_client_stats(struct obd_device *obd)
00140 {
00141         struct cfs_hash *hash = obd->obd_nid_stats_hash;
00142         struct nid_stat *stat;
00143         ENTRY;
00144 
00145         /* we need extra list - because hash_exit called to early */
00146         /* not need locking because all clients is died */
00147         while (!list_empty(&obd->obd_nid_stats)) {
00148                 stat = list_entry(obd->obd_nid_stats.next,
00149                                   struct nid_stat, nid_list);
00150                 list_del_init(&stat->nid_list);
00151                 cfs_hash_del(hash, &stat->nid, &stat->nid_hash);
00152                 lprocfs_free_client_stats(stat);
00153         }
00154         EXIT;
00155 }
00156 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lprocfs_free_per_client_stats);

00158 static int
00159 lprocfs_exp_print_uuid_seq(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00160                            struct hlist_node *hnode, void *cb_data)
00161 {
00162         struct seq_file *m = cb_data;
00163         struct obd_export *exp = cfs_hash_object(hs, hnode);
00164 
00165         if (exp->exp_nid_stats != NULL)
00166                 seq_printf(m, "%s\n", obd_uuid2str(&exp->exp_client_uuid));
00167         return 0;
00168 }

00171 lprocfs_exp_print_nodemap_seq(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,

00176         struct lu_nodemap *nodemap = exp->exp_target_data.ted_nodemap;
00177 
00178         if (nodemap != NULL)
00179                 seq_printf(m, "%s\n", nodemap->nm_name);
00180         return 0;

00184 lprocfs_exp_nodemap_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00185 {
00186         struct nid_stat *stats = m->private;
00187         struct obd_device *obd = stats->nid_obd;
00188 
00189         cfs_hash_for_each_key(obd->obd_nid_hash, &stats->nid,
00190                               lprocfs_exp_print_nodemap_seq, m);
00191         return 0;
00192 }

00208                            struct hlist_node *hnode, void *cb_data)
00209 
00210 {

00213 
00214         if (exp->exp_lock_hash != NULL) {
00215                 cfs_hash_debug_header(m);
00216                 cfs_hash_debug_str(hs, m);
00217         }
00218         return 0;
00219 }

00232 int lprocfs_exp_print_replydata_seq(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,

00234

00244                    ted->ted_reply_cnt,
00245                    ted->ted_reply_max,
00246                    ted->ted_release_xid,
00247                    ted->ted_release_tag);

00262 int lprocfs_nid_stats_clear_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00263 {
00264         seq_puts(m, "Write into this file to clear all nid stats and stale nid entries\n");
00265         return 0;
00266 }
00267 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lprocfs_nid_stats_clear_seq_show);
00268 
00269 static int lprocfs_nid_stats_clear_write_cb(void *obj, void *data)
00270 {
00271         struct nid_stat *stat = obj;
00272         ENTRY;
00273 
00274         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "refcnt %d\n", atomic_read(&stat->nid_exp_ref_count));
00275         if (atomic_read(&stat->nid_exp_ref_count) == 1) {
00276                 /* object has only hash references. */
00277                 spin_lock(&stat->nid_obd->obd_nid_lock);
00278                 list_move(&stat->nid_list, data);
00279                 spin_unlock(&stat->nid_obd->obd_nid_lock);
00280                 RETURN(1);
00281         }
00282         /* we has reference to object - only clear data*/
00283         if (stat->nid_stats)
00284                 lprocfs_clear_stats(stat->nid_stats);
00285 
00286         RETURN(0);
00287 }
00288 
00289 ssize_t
00290 lprocfs_nid_stats_clear_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00291                                         size_t count, loff_t *off)
00292 {
00293         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00294         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00295         struct nid_stat *client_stat;
00296         struct list_head free_list;
00297 
00298         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&free_list);
00299         cfs_hash_cond_del(obd->obd_nid_stats_hash,
00300                           lprocfs_nid_stats_clear_write_cb, &free_list);
00301 
00302         while (!list_empty(&free_list)) {
00303                 client_stat = list_entry(free_list.next, struct nid_stat,
00304                                          nid_list);
00305                 list_del_init(&client_stat->nid_list);
00306                 lprocfs_free_client_stats(client_stat);
00307         }
00308         return count;
00309 }
00310 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lprocfs_nid_stats_clear_seq_write);
00311 
00312 int lprocfs_exp_setup(struct obd_export *exp, lnet_nid_t *nid)
00313 {
00314         struct nid_stat *new_stat, *old_stat;
00315         struct obd_device *obd = NULL;
00316         struct proc_dir_entry *entry;
00317         char nidstr[LNET_NIDSTR_SIZE];
00318         int rc = 0;
00319         ENTRY;
00320 
00321         if (!exp || !exp->exp_obd || !exp->exp_obd->obd_proc_exports_entry ||
00322             !exp->exp_obd->obd_nid_stats_hash)
00323                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00324 
00325         /* not test against zero because eric say:
00326          * You may only test nid against another nid, or LNET_NID_ANY.
00327          * Anything else is nonsense.*/
00328         if (nid == NULL || *nid == LNET_NID_ANY)
00329                 RETURN(-EALREADY);
00330 
00331         libcfs_nid2str_r(*nid, nidstr, sizeof(nidstr));
00332 
00333         spin_lock(&exp->exp_lock);
00334         if (exp->exp_nid_stats != NULL) {
00335                 spin_unlock(&exp->exp_lock);
00336                 RETURN(-EALREADY);
00337         }
00338         spin_unlock(&exp->exp_lock);
00339 
00340         obd = exp->exp_obd;
00341 
00342         CDEBUG(D_CONFIG, "using hash %p\n", obd->obd_nid_stats_hash);
00343 
00344         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(new_stat);
00345         if (new_stat == NULL)
00346                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00347 
00348         new_stat->nid     = *nid;
00349         new_stat->nid_obd = exp->exp_obd;
00350         /* we need set default refcount to 1 to balance obd_disconnect */
00351         atomic_set(&new_stat->nid_exp_ref_count, 1);
00352 
00353         old_stat = cfs_hash_findadd_unique(obd->obd_nid_stats_hash,
00354                                            nid, &new_stat->nid_hash);
00355         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Found stats %p for nid %s - ref %d\n",
00356                old_stat, nidstr, atomic_read(&old_stat->nid_exp_ref_count));
00357 
00358         /* Return -EALREADY here so that we know that the /proc
00359          * entry already has been created */
00360         if (old_stat != new_stat) {
00361                 spin_lock(&exp->exp_lock);
00362                 if (exp->exp_nid_stats) {
00363                         LASSERT(exp->exp_nid_stats == old_stat);
00364                         nidstat_putref(exp->exp_nid_stats);
00365                 }
00366                 exp->exp_nid_stats = old_stat;
00367                 spin_unlock(&exp->exp_lock);
00368                 GOTO(destroy_new, rc = -EALREADY);
00369         }
00370         /* not found - create */
00371         new_stat->nid_proc = lprocfs_register(nidstr,
00372                                               obd->obd_proc_exports_entry,
00373                                               NULL, NULL);
00374 
00375         if (IS_ERR(new_stat->nid_proc)) {
00376                 rc = PTR_ERR(new_stat->nid_proc);
00377                 new_stat->nid_proc = NULL;
00378                 CERROR("%s: cannot create proc entry for export %s: rc = %d\n",
00379                        obd->obd_name, nidstr, rc);
00380                 GOTO(destroy_new_ns, rc);
00381         }
00382 
00383         entry = lprocfs_add_simple(new_stat->nid_proc, "nodemap", new_stat,
00384                                    &lprocfs_exp_nodemap_fops);
00385         if (IS_ERR(entry)) {
00386                 rc = PTR_ERR(entry);
00387                 CWARN("Error adding the nodemap file: rc = %d\n", rc);
00388                 GOTO(destroy_new_ns, rc);
00389         }
00390 
00391         entry = lprocfs_add_simple(new_stat->nid_proc, "uuid", new_stat,
00392                                    &lprocfs_exp_uuid_fops);
00393         if (IS_ERR(entry)) {
00394                 rc = PTR_ERR(entry);
00395                 CWARN("Error adding the NID stats file: rc = %d\n", rc);
00396                 GOTO(destroy_new_ns, rc);
00397         }
00398 
00399         entry = lprocfs_add_simple(new_stat->nid_proc, "hash", new_stat,
00400                                    &lprocfs_exp_hash_fops);
00401         if (IS_ERR(entry)) {
00402                 rc = PTR_ERR(entry);
00403                 CWARN("Error adding the hash file: rc = %d\n", rc);
00404                 GOTO(destroy_new_ns, rc);
00405         }
00406 
00407         entry = lprocfs_add_simple(new_stat->nid_proc, "reply_data", new_stat,
00408                                    &lprocfs_exp_replydata_fops);
00409         if (IS_ERR(entry)) {
00410                 rc = PTR_ERR(entry);
00411                 CWARN("%s: Error adding the reply_data file: rc = %d\n",
00412                       obd->obd_name, rc);
00413                 GOTO(destroy_new_ns, rc);
00414         }
00415 
00416         spin_lock(&exp->exp_lock);
00417         exp->exp_nid_stats = new_stat;
00418         spin_unlock(&exp->exp_lock);
00419 
00420         /* protect competitive add to list, not need locking on destroy */
00421         spin_lock(&obd->obd_nid_lock);
00422         list_add(&new_stat->nid_list, &obd->obd_nid_stats);
00423         spin_unlock(&obd->obd_nid_lock);
00424 
00425         RETURN(0);
00426 
00427 destroy_new_ns:
00428         if (new_stat->nid_proc != NULL)
00429                 lprocfs_remove(&new_stat->nid_proc);
00430         cfs_hash_del(obd->obd_nid_stats_hash, nid, &new_stat->nid_hash);
00431 
00432 destroy_new:
00433         nidstat_putref(new_stat);
00434         OBD_FREE_PTR(new_stat);
00435         RETURN(rc);
00436 }
00437 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lprocfs_exp_setup);
00438 
00439 int lprocfs_exp_cleanup(struct obd_export *exp)
00440 {
00441         struct nid_stat *stat = exp->exp_nid_stats;
00442 
00443         if (!stat || !exp->exp_obd)
00444                 RETURN(0);
00445 
00446         nidstat_putref(exp->exp_nid_stats);
00447         exp->exp_nid_stats = NULL;
00448 
00449         return 0;
00450 }
00451 
00452 #define LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(base, stats, op)                    \
00453 do {                                                            \
00454         unsigned int coffset = base + OBD_COUNTER_OFFSET(op);   \
00455         LASSERT(coffset < stats->ls_num);                       \
00456         lprocfs_counter_init(stats, coffset, 0, #op, "reqs");   \
00457 } while (0)
00458 
00459 void lprocfs_init_ops_stats(int num_private_stats, struct lprocfs_stats *stats)
00460 {
00461         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, iocontrol);
00462         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, get_info);
00463         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, set_info_async);
00464         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, setup);
00465         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, precleanup);
00466         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, cleanup);
00467         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, process_config);
00468         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, postrecov);
00469         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, add_conn);
00470         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, del_conn);
00471         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, connect);
00472         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, reconnect);
00473         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, disconnect);
00474         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, fid_init);
00475         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, fid_fini);
00476         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, fid_alloc);
00477         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, statfs);
00478         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, statfs_async);
00479         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, create);
00480         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, destroy);
00481         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, setattr);
00482         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, getattr);
00483         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, preprw);
00484         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, commitrw);
00485         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, init_export);
00486         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, destroy_export);
00487         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, import_event);
00488         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, notify);
00489         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, health_check);
00490         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, get_uuid);
00491         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, quotactl);
00492         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, ping);
00493         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, pool_new);
00494         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, pool_rem);
00495         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, pool_add);
00496         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, pool_del);
00497         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, getref);
00498         LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(num_private_stats, stats, putref);
00499 
00500         CLASSERT(NUM_OBD_STATS == OBD_COUNTER_OFFSET(putref) + 1);
00501 }
00502 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lprocfs_init_ops_stats);
00503 
00504 int lprocfs_alloc_obd_stats(struct obd_device *obd, unsigned num_private_stats)
00505 {
00506         struct lprocfs_stats *stats;
00507         unsigned int num_stats;
00508         int rc, i;
00509 
00510         LASSERT(obd->obd_stats == NULL);
00511         LASSERT(obd->obd_proc_entry != NULL);
00512         LASSERT(obd->obd_cntr_base == 0);
00513 
00514         num_stats = NUM_OBD_STATS + num_private_stats;
00515         stats = lprocfs_alloc_stats(num_stats, 0);
00516         if (stats == NULL)
00517                 return -ENOMEM;
00518 
00519         lprocfs_init_ops_stats(num_private_stats, stats);
00520 
00521         for (i = num_private_stats; i < num_stats; i++) {
00522                 /* If this LBUGs, it is likely that an obd
00523                  * operation was added to struct obd_ops in
00524                  * <obd.h>, and that the corresponding line item
00525                  * LPROCFS_OBD_OP_INIT(.., .., opname)
00526                  * is missing from the list above. */
00527                 LASSERTF(stats->ls_cnt_header[i].lc_name != NULL,
00528                          "Missing obd_stat initializer obd_op "
00529                          "operation at offset %d.\n", i - num_private_stats);
00530         }
00531         rc = lprocfs_register_stats(obd->obd_proc_entry, "stats", stats);
00532         if (rc < 0) {
00533                 lprocfs_free_stats(&stats);
00534         } else {
00535                 obd->obd_stats  = stats;
00536                 obd->obd_cntr_base = num_private_stats;
00537         }
00538         return rc;
00539 }
00540 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lprocfs_alloc_obd_stats);
00541 
00542 void lprocfs_free_obd_stats(struct obd_device *obd)
00543 {
00544         if (obd->obd_stats)
00545                 lprocfs_free_stats(&obd->obd_stats);
00546 }
00547 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lprocfs_free_obd_stats);
00548 
00549 int lprocfs_hash_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00550 {
00551         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00552 
00553         if (obd == NULL)
00554                 return 0;
00555 
00556         cfs_hash_debug_header(m);
00557         cfs_hash_debug_str(obd->obd_uuid_hash, m);
00558         cfs_hash_debug_str(obd->obd_nid_hash, m);
00559         cfs_hash_debug_str(obd->obd_nid_stats_hash, m);
00560         return 0;
00561 }
00562 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lprocfs_hash_seq_show);
00563 
00564 int lprocfs_recovery_status_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00565 {
00566         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00567 
00568         LASSERT(obd != NULL);
00569 
00570         seq_printf(m, "status: ");
00571         if (obd->obd_max_recoverable_clients == 0) {
00572                 seq_printf(m, "INACTIVE\n");
00573                 goto out;
00574         }
00575 
00576         /* sampled unlocked, but really... */
00577         if (obd->obd_recovering == 0) {
00578                 seq_printf(m, "COMPLETE\n");
00579                 seq_printf(m, "recovery_start: %lu\n", obd->obd_recovery_start);
00580                 seq_printf(m, "recovery_duration: %lu\n",
00581                            obd->obd_recovery_end - obd->obd_recovery_start);
00582                 /* Number of clients that have completed recovery */
00583                 seq_printf(m, "completed_clients: %d/%d\n",
00584                            obd->obd_max_recoverable_clients -
00585                            obd->obd_stale_clients,
00586                            obd->obd_max_recoverable_clients);
00587                 seq_printf(m, "replayed_requests: %d\n",
00588                            obd->obd_replayed_requests);
00589                 seq_printf(m, "last_transno: "LPD64"\n",
00590                            obd->obd_next_recovery_transno - 1);
00591                 seq_printf(m, "VBR: %s\n", obd->obd_version_recov ?
00592                            "ENABLED" : "DISABLED");
00593                 seq_printf(m, "IR: %s\n", obd->obd_no_ir ?
00594                            "DISABLED" : "ENABLED");
00595                 goto out;
00596         }
00597 
00598         seq_printf(m, "RECOVERING\n");
00599         seq_printf(m, "recovery_start: %lu\n", obd->obd_recovery_start);
00600         seq_printf(m, "time_remaining: %lu\n",
00601                    cfs_time_current_sec() >=
00602                    obd->obd_recovery_start +
00603                    obd->obd_recovery_timeout ? 0 :
00604                    obd->obd_recovery_start +
00605                    obd->obd_recovery_timeout -
00606                    cfs_time_current_sec());
00607         seq_printf(m, "connected_clients: %d/%d\n",
00608                    atomic_read(&obd->obd_connected_clients),
00609                    obd->obd_max_recoverable_clients);
00610         /* Number of clients that have completed recovery */
00611         seq_printf(m, "req_replay_clients: %d\n",
00612                    atomic_read(&obd->obd_req_replay_clients));
00613         seq_printf(m, "lock_repay_clients: %d\n",
00614                    atomic_read(&obd->obd_lock_replay_clients));
00615         seq_printf(m, "completed_clients: %d\n",
00616                    atomic_read(&obd->obd_connected_clients) -
00617                    atomic_read(&obd->obd_lock_replay_clients));
00618         seq_printf(m, "evicted_clients: %d\n", obd->obd_stale_clients);
00619         seq_printf(m, "replayed_requests: %d\n", obd->obd_replayed_requests);
00620         seq_printf(m, "queued_requests: %d\n",
00621                    obd->obd_requests_queued_for_recovery);
00622         seq_printf(m, "next_transno: "LPD64"\n",
00623                    obd->obd_next_recovery_transno);
00624 out:
00625         return 0;
00626 }
00627 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lprocfs_recovery_status_seq_show);
00628 
00629 int lprocfs_ir_factor_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00630 {

00632 
00633         LASSERT(obd != NULL);
00634         seq_printf(m, "%d\n", obd->obd_recovery_ir_factor);
00635         return 0;
00636 }
00637 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lprocfs_ir_factor_seq_show);
00638 
00639 ssize_t
00640 lprocfs_ir_factor_seq_write(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00641                             size_t count, loff_t *off)
00642 {
00643         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00644         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00645         int rc;
00646         __s64 val;
00647 
00648         LASSERT(obd != NULL);
00649         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00650         if (rc)
00651                 return rc;
00652 
00653         if (val < OBD_IR_FACTOR_MIN || val > OBD_IR_FACTOR_MAX)
00654                 return -EINVAL;
00655 
00656         obd->obd_recovery_ir_factor = val;
00657         return count;
00658 }
00659 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lprocfs_ir_factor_seq_write);
00660 
00661 int lprocfs_recovery_time_soft_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00662 {

00664 
00665         LASSERT(obd != NULL);
00666         seq_printf(m, "%d\n", obd->obd_recovery_timeout);

00668 }
00669 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lprocfs_recovery_time_soft_seq_show);
00670 
00671 ssize_t
00672 lprocfs_recovery_time_soft_seq_write(struct file *file,
00673                                      const char __user *buffer,
00674                                      size_t count, loff_t *off)
00675 {
00676         struct seq_file *m = file->private_data;
00677         struct obd_device *obd = m->private;
00678         int rc;
00679         __s64 val;
00680 
00681         LASSERT(obd != NULL);
00682         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00683         if (rc)
00684                 return rc;
00685         if (val < 0 || val > INT_MAX)
00686                 return -ERANGE;
00687 
00688         obd->obd_recovery_timeout = val;
00689         return count;
00690 }
00691 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lprocfs_recovery_time_soft_seq_write);

00718                 return -ERANGE;

00725 int lprocfs_target_instance_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
